## Setup

```{r setup}
library(tidyverse)
library(here)
library(fs)

source(here("R/functions.R"))
```

## Using map 

```{r}
user_info_files <- dir_ls(here("data-raw/mmash/"), regexp = "user_info.csv", recurse = TRUE)

user_info_df <- map(user_info_files, import_user_info) |> list_rbind(names_to = "file_path_id")

```
